class.name: AudioStreamPlayer2D
class.description: Plays audio that dampens with distance from screen center. See also [AudioStreamPlayer] to play a sound non-positionally. [b]Note:[/b] Hiding an [AudioStreamPlayer2D] node does not disable its audio output. To temporarily disable an [AudioStreamPlayer2D]'s audio output, set [member volume_db] to a very low value like [code]-100[/code] (which isn't audible to human hearing).

method.name: get_stream_playback
method.description: Returns the [AudioStreamPlayback] object associated with this [AudioStreamPlayer2D].

method.name: play
method.description: Plays the audio from the given position [code]from_position[/code], in seconds.

method.name: seek
method.description: Sets the position from which audio will be played, in seconds.

members.member: Areas in which this sound plays.
Dampens audio over distance with this as an exponent.
If [code]true[/code], audio plays when added to scene tree.
Bus on which this audio is playing.
Maximum distance from which audio is still hearable.
The pitch and the tempo of the audio, as a multiplier of the audio sample's sample rate.
If [code]true[/code], the playback is paused. You can resume it by setting [code]stream_paused[/code] to [code]false[/code].

signal.name: finished
signal.description: Emitted when the audio stops playing.
